Material used.Description: HEK293 cells were transfected with plasmids containing wild-type and mutant SNCA.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: increased aggregation and altered interaction with other cellular components
Readout description.Result Description: The co-immunoprecipitation showed increased levels of aggregated protein and different band patterns compared to wild-type SNCA when expressing the c.209G>A mutation.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each condition.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in duplicate for Western blot analysis.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type SNCA plasmid was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA followed by post-hoc Tukey's test.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Low aggregation and normal interaction with cellular partners.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Increased aggregation and altered interaction with cellular partners.
